Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis second submission replaces the first following submission at: arXiv:1505.03977 It completes this later by adding a second model to complete the first one. It corresponds to particular surfaces (Lego cubes) and the
other remained results(about 500 3D surfaces). This is to avoid huge file size for our submission and to proof the effectiveness of our model\u00a7r
